section.name: AR Scripting
section.p:
Download the zip of examples. It contains examples and utilities written in
Java
Python
Perl
C
Also see AcrRecipies Wiki page for more examples of how to connect to AR from different languages.

section.name: Tutorials
section.p: In time, we'll put some worked examples on this page. Meanwhile, try this wiki tutorial. The solutions are available online, and also in the examples zip above.
